scripts.deploy: npm run build && aws s3 sync ./dist s3://mqtt.amare.tv/ --acl public-read --delete --profile amare-admin
scripts.aws:stack:create: aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name frontend --template-body file://./aws/stack.yml --parameters ParameterKey=DomainName,ParameterValue=mqtt.amare.tv --profile amare-admin --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.aws:stack:update: aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name frontend --template-body file://./aws/stack.yml --parameters ParameterKey=DomainName,ParameterValue=mqtt.amare.tv --profile amare-admin --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
